member.returns: A string with each environment variable replaced by its value.
member.param: A string containing the names of zero or more environment variables. Each environment variable is quoted with the percent sign character (%).
member.exception: is null.

An exception that represents the error that caused the termination. This is typically the exception in a catch block.

The buffer is out of memory.

member.name: P:System.Environment.ProcessorCount
member.summary: Gets the number of processors on the current machine.

If the current machine contains multiple processor groups, this property returns the number of logical processors that are available for use by the common language runtime (CLR).
